rule.name: AUT_TestFormRow
rule.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridRowLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Label", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: index(local!gridTextField, ri!index, null), saveInto: local!gridTextField[ri!index], refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Label", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: index(local!gridParagraphField, ri!index, null), saveInto: local!gridParagraphField[ri!index], refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", height: "MEDIUM", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_encryptedTextField"( label: "Label", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: index(local!gridEncryptedTextField, ri!index, null), saveInto: local!gridEncryptedTextField[ri!index], refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "Label", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: index(local!gridIntegerField, ri!index, null), saveInto: local!gridIntegerField[ri!index], refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"( label: "Label", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: index(local!gridDecimalField, ri!index, null), saveInto: local!gridDecimalField[ri!index], refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Label", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: index(local!gridDateField, ri!index, null), saveInto: local!gridDateField[ri!index], validations: {} ) } )
